languages.text: "А в себе ли ты, Домин'{name}?! Мы заточены в живом кошмаре, попирающем все, что свято! Откуда мне знать, что скверна ксеносов не отравила и тебя?!"

traits.locale_text: "А в себе ли ты, Эним'{name}?! Мы заточены в живом кошмаре, попирающем все, что свято! Откуда мне знать, что скверна ксеносов не отравила тебя, коль столь просто ты рассуждаешь о том, трезв ли мой разум или нет?!"

languages.text: "Are you, Domin'{name}? We are trapped in a waking nightmare that scorns all that is holy! How do I know that the xenos rot hasn't poisoned you too?"
languages.original_text: "А в себе ли ты, Домин'{name}?! Мы заточены в живом кошмаре, попирающем все, что свято! Откуда мне знать, что скверна ксеносов не отравила и тебя?!"

traits.locale_text: "Are you, Enim'{name}? We're trapped in a waking nightmare that scorns all that is holy! How do I know that the xenos rot hasn't poisoned you too?"
"Are you, Enim'{name}? We're trapped in a waking nightmare that scorns all that is holy! How do I know that the xenos rot hasn't poisoned you too?"
"Are you, Enim'{name}? We are trapped in a waking nightmare that scorns all that is holy! How do I know that the xenos rot hasn't poisoned you too?"
"Are you, Enim'{name}? We are trapped in a waking nightmare that scorns all that is holy! How do I know that the xenos rot hasn't poisoned you too?"
"Are you, Domin'{name}? We are trapped in a waking nightmare that scorns all that is holy! How do I know that the xenos rot hasn't poisoned you too?"
"Are you, Domin'{name}? We are trapped in a waking nightmare that scorns all that is holy! How do I know that the xenos rot hasn't poisoned you too?"

languages.text: «¿Usted no, Domin'{name}? ¡Estamos atrapados en una pesadilla que se burla de todo lo que es sagrado! ¿Cómo sé que la podredumbre xenos no le ha emponzoñado también a usted?».
languages.original_text: "Are you, Domin'{name}? We are trapped in a waking nightmare that scorns all that is holy! How do I know that the xenos rot hasn't poisoned you too?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Usted no, Domin'{name}? ¡Estamos atrapados en una pesadilla que se burla de todo lo que es sagrado! ¿Cómo sé que la podredumbre xenos no le ha emponzoñado también a usted?».

languages.text: 「あなたはどうなの、ドミン・{name}？私たちは、あらゆる聖なるものをさげすむ悪夢にとらわれているの！あなたが異種族の腐乱に毒されていないと、どうやって確かめればいいの？」
languages.original_text: "Are you, Domin'{name}? We are trapped in a waking nightmare that scorns all that is holy! How do I know that the xenos rot hasn't poisoned you too?"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたはどうなの、ドミン・{name}？私たちは、あらゆる聖なるものをさげすむ悪夢にとらわれているの！あなたが異種族の腐乱に毒されていないと、どうやって確かめればいいの？」

languages.text: “是这样吗，秘者{name}？我们被困在活生生的噩梦之中，它在蔑视一切神圣之物！我又怎么知道那些异形的毒液会不会也毒害了你呢？”
languages.original_text: "Are you, Domin'{name}? We are trapped in a waking nightmare that scorns all that is holy! How do I know that the xenos rot hasn't poisoned you too?"

traits.locale_text: “是这样吗，秘者{name}？我们被困在活生生的噩梦之中，它在蔑视一切神圣之物！我又怎么知道那些异形的毒液会不会也毒害了你呢？”

languages.text: "Und Ihr, Domin'{name}? Wir sind in einem wachen Albtraum gefangen, der alles verachtet, was heilig ist! Woher weiß ich, dass die Xenos-Fäulnis nicht auch Euch vergiftet hat?"
languages.original_text: "Are you, Domin'{name}? We are trapped in a waking nightmare that scorns all that is holy! How do I know that the xenos rot hasn't poisoned you too?"

traits.locale_text: "Und Ihr, Domin'{name}? Wir sind in einem wachen Albtraum gefangen, der alles verachtet, was heilig ist! Woher weiß ich, dass die Xenos-Fäulnis nicht auch Euch vergiftet hat?"

languages.text: « Je vous retourne la question, Domin'{name}. Nous sommes {mf|piégés|piégées} dans un cauchemar éveillé qui bafoue toutes les lois du sacré ! Comment savoir si la corruption xénos ne vous a pas {mf|intoxiqué|intoxiquée} vous aussi ? »
languages.original_text: "Are you, Domin'{name}? We are trapped in a waking nightmare that scorns all that is holy! How do I know that the xenos rot hasn't poisoned you too?"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous retourne la question, Domin'{name}. Nous sommes {mf|piégés|piégées} dans un cauchemar éveillé qui bafoue toutes les lois du sacré ! Comment savoir si la corruption xénos ne vous a pas {mf|intoxiqué|intoxiquée} vous aussi ? »

languages.original_text: "Are you, Domin'? We are trapped in a waking nightmare that scorns all that is holy! How do I know that the xenos rot hasn't poisoned you too?"

languages.text: "Peki ya sen Domin'{name}? Küfrün âlâsını yaşatan, bitmek bilmeyen bir kâbusta kapana kısıldık! Zenoların zehrinden senin de payını almadığın ne malum?"
languages.original_text: "Are you, Domin'{name}? We are trapped in a waking nightmare that scorns all that is holy! How do I know that the xenos rot hasn't poisoned you too?"
